definition: surname Gan/abbr. for Gansu Province 甘肅省|甘肃省[Gan1 su4 Sheng3]
dish (type of food)/vegetable/cuisine/CL:盤|盘[pan2],道[dao4]/(coll.) (one's) type/(of one's skills etc) weak/poor

sentences.english: The highest calcium content is found in collard greens, mustard greens, spinach, and swiss chard.
sentences.chinese: 其中钙含量最高的是甘蓝菜，芥菜，菠菜和唐莴苣。

sentences.english: Who care if me eat carrot or collard greens?
sentences.chinese: 谁在乎我吃胡萝卜还是甘蓝菜？

sentences.english: Did you also get ground pork, cabbage, garlic and pep per for the filling?
sentences.chinese: 你也买了碎猪肉。甘蓝菜。大蒜和辣椒做馅用吗？

sentences.english: In Denmark, a popular New Year’s dish is sweetened kale cooked with cinnamon.
sentences.chinese: 在丹麦，一个很流行的新年食物就是甜甘蓝菜煮肉桂。

sentences.english: Past studies have shown that consumption of Brassica vegetables decreases the risk of cancer.
sentences.chinese: 以往的研究表明，甘蓝菜可以降低癌症的发病风险。

sentences.english: Or simply choose quinoa or kale instead.
sentences.chinese: 或选择简单的麦制品或甘蓝菜来代替。

definition: variant of 卷心菜[juan3 xin1 cai4]
Brussels sprouts (Brassica oleracea L. var. gemmifera)
Chinese broccoli/Chinese kale/cabbage mustard/Brassica oleracea var. alboglabra/also pr. [jie4 lan2]
